channel.title: Game Crash after firing MP5 grenade
channel.description:
Indeed. At the part where the planes flyby (I don't know what chapter/map is it called) but it's on the Black Mesa trailer as well. Either way, after leaving the water pipe and jumping to the third rock, firing a MP5 grenade, where that soldier and that sentry gun or whatnot are, will crash the game. I've made that twice and same result... so... it's something you should avoid using, the grenades.
Cheers! PS: Not sure if it's a bug, however, this happened to me twice so I had to report.
***EDIT***: [url='https://www.dropbox.com/s/bkc2cmk8nhxo1xs/hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_21T19_45_37C0.mdmp']Click me for the MDMP file.[/url]
